SELECT e.employee_id, e.employment_type, e.korean_name, e.english_name, e.hire_date, e.resignation_date, e.department_id, e.position_id, e.foreign_or_domestic, e.resident_number1, e.resident_number2, e.address, e.tel_phone, e.mobile, e.email, e.sns, e.other_details, e.status, d.department_name FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.department_id = d.department_id
e.employment_type = '일용직'

AND e.korean_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{koreanName}, '%')
AND d.department_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{departmentName}, '%')
